site.title: AG Sutura Couture - Style with Dignity

hero.title: The Art of Precise Tailoring

about.title: About the Workshop
about.subtitle: AG Sutura Couture
about.description: Founded by Mr Abdoul-Ghaffar Moumouni, our workshop embodies tailoring excellence in Niamey. With passion and precision, we transform fabric into elegant works of art.

values.passion_desc: Love for the craft and well-done work
values.elegance_desc: Style and dignity in every creation
